name: 吳美玲
objective:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
凡學生有全民英檢中級（初試）、托福成績500分、電腦托福成績173分或本校英語能力鑑定考試中級、全校英語演講或寫作比賽得獎之證明，可申請抵免本門課程。
schedule:
Week 01 (9/11): Course Introduction
Week 02 (9/18): Unit One--Party Talk
Week 03 (9/25): Unit One--Party Talk
Week 04 (10/02): Unit Two--Weekend at Home
Week 05 (10/09): Unit Three--You Haven't Changed a Bit
Week 06 (10/16): Unit Four--Pen Pals and Keypals
Week 07 (10/23): Review 1
Week 08 (10/30): Review GEPT Rehearsal Test Online (Listening Part)Unit 11~15
Week 09 (11/06): Mid-term Exam 期中考
Week 10 (11/13): Unit Five--Let's Get Something to Eat
Week 11 (11/20): Unit Five--Let's Get Something to Eat
Week 12 (11/27): Unit Six--Let's Party
Week 13 (12/04): Unit Seven--Sightseeing
Week 14 (12/11): Unit Eight--You are the One for Me
Week 15 (12/18): Review 2
Week 16 (12/25): Review GEPT Rehearsal Test Online (Listening Part)--Unit 16~20
Week 17 (1/01): Holiday--No class.
Week 18 (1/08): Final Exam 期末考
scorePolicy:
英文期中會考聽力成績15%
英文期末會考聽力成績15%
聽力課程期中考成績20%
聽力課程期末考成績20%
出席及平時成績30%
